channel.title: Rhino.Commands on Hugo based API Site
channel.description: Recent content in Rhino.Commands on Hugo based API Site

item.title: Command
item.description: Namespace: Rhino.Commands Defines a base class for all commands. This class is abstract. public class Command Events static BeginCommand Called just before command.RunCommand(). static EndCommand Called immediately after command.RunCommand(). static UndoRedo Used to monitor Rhino’s built in undo/redo support. Properties static Guid LastCommandId Gets the ID of the last commands. static Result LastCommandResult Gets the result code of the last command. string EnglishName Gets the name of the command.

item.title: CommandEventArgs
item.description: Namespace: Rhino.Commands public class CommandEventArgs : EventArgs Properties string CommandEnglishName Gets the English name of the command that raised this event. Guid CommandId Gets the ID of the command that raised this event. string CommandLocalName Gets the name of the command that raised this event in the local language. string CommandPluginName Gets the name of the plug-in that this command belongs to. If the command is internal to Rhino, then this propert is an empty string.

item.title: CommandStyleAttribute
item.description: Namespace: Rhino.Commands Decorates commands to provide styles. [AttributeUsage(AttributeTargets.Class)] public class CommandStyleAttribute : Attribute Constructors CommandStyleAttribute(Style styles) Initializes a new command style attribute class. Properties Style Styles Gets the associated style.

item.title: CustomUndoEventArgs
item.description: Namespace: Rhino.Commands Argument package that is passed to a custom undo delegate public class CustomUndoEventArgs : EventArgs Properties string ActionDescription Guid CommandId bool CreatedByRedo RhinoDoc Document object Tag uint UndoSerialNumber

item.title: MostRecentCommandDescription
item.description: Namespace: Rhino.Commands Stores the macro and display string of the most recent command. public class MostRecentCommandDescription Properties string DisplayString string Macro

item.title: SelCommand
item.description: Namespace: Rhino.Commands For adding nestable selection commands that work like the native Rhino SelCrv command, derive your command from SelCommand and override the virtual SelFilter function. public class SelCommand : Command Properties bool BeQuiet bool TestGrips bool TestLights

item.title: UndoRedoEventArgs
item.description: Namespace: Rhino.Commands public class UndoRedoEventArgs : EventArgs Properties Guid CommandId bool IsBeginRecording bool IsBeginRedo bool IsBeginUndo bool IsEndRecording bool IsEndRedo bool IsEndUndo bool IsPurgeRecord uint UndoSerialNumber
